scenarios.title: My Anime Crush Come to Life
scenarios.description: Maria transformed her favorite streamer into a 'Demon Slayer' style anime character. Now she has personalized art of him as if he were the protagonist of her favorite series. Do you have an influencer or friend you'd like to see in anime style?

scenarios.title: The Actor from the Series I Love
scenarios.description: Carlos created sensual art of his favorite actor from 'Money Heist' in an intimate scenario. He transformed screenshots into unique pieces that look like they're from an exclusive photoshoot. Which celebrity would you like to immortalize?

scenarios.title: My University Professor
scenarios.description: Andrea imagined her charismatic literature professor in a romantic French movie-style scenario. She uploaded a campus photo and the AI created artwork worthy of a novel cover. Do you have a university crush?

scenarios.title: My Friend as a Professional Model
scenarios.description: Diego surprised his best friend by transforming her casual photo into a glamorous Vogue-style portrait. The AI captured her essence but elevated to a high-impact photoshoot. Want to see someone special in maximum elegance?

scenarios.title: The Gamer I Admire as Epic Hero
scenarios.description: Luna converted her favorite Twitch streamer into an 'Elden Ring' warrior with full armor and legendary sword. From gameplay to epic video game art. Which gamer or friend would you see as an RPG protagonist?

scenarios.title: My Favorite Singer Pin-Up Style
scenarios.description: Robert transformed his favorite musical artist into a vintage 50s illustration, mixing their modern style with classic retro aesthetic. Unique art that doesn't exist anywhere else. Which musician or celebrity would you reimagine?

characterCarousel.subtitle: Each one waits for you... Who will you choose?
